Attached is the June 2 - 3, 2007, Special Board Meeting/Board Retreat Agenda (PDF).
	 
	 
	 
BOARD OF TRUSTEES RETREAT 
		 
Date:  Saturday, June 2, 2007 and 
           Sunday, June 3, 2007 
		 
Time:   June 2    Open Session beginning at 9:00 a.m. for                  
                            Agenda Items 1, 2.1, 3 and 4          
                            (Working dinner begins approx. at 6:00 p.m.) 
            June 3    Open Session beginning at 8:30 a.m. for 
                            Agenda Items 1, 2.2, 3 and 4 
		 
Place: Dolce Hayes Mansion – Almaden Room 
           200 Edenvale Avenue 
           San Jose, CA 95136

June 2, 2007 
Retreat Agenda: 
		 
CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST  
Review: Retreat Goals, Objectives, Agenda and Retreat Team Norms  
Review and Discussion – District’s Vision & Mission Statements and application to District’s academic and administrative operations (including curriculum & instruction, facilities planning, budget, business services, and personnel)  
Presentation and Integration of Board and Administration Vision Statements  
Presentation and Integration of Board and Administration Mission Statements 
LUNCH  
Review & Discuss ESUHSD Goals and application to District’s academic and administrative operations (including curriculum & instruction, facilities planning, budget, business services, and personnel)  
Brainstorming and Agreeing On Additional Key Goals  
Presenting Key Goal Statements  
Creating the ESUHSD Key Goals Road Map and application to District’s academic and administrative operations (including curriculum & instruction, facilities planning, budget, business services, and personnel) 
BREAK  
Brainstorming Key Roles & Responsibilities of Board and Administration  
Outlining & Presenting Key Roles & Responsibilities  
Communicating Effectively: Discuss Norms & Protocols – “Pain Points” 
Brainstorming “Key Pain Points”  
Review and Discuss Goals and Initiatives; Develop Strategies for Effective Implementation in District’s academic and administrative operations (including curriculum & instruction, facilities planning, budget, business services, and personnel)  
Wrap-up of Day One and Review of Day Two Agenda 
GOVERNANCE TEAM WORKING DINNER

June 3, 2007 
Retreat Agenda: 
	 
CONTINENTAL BREAKFAST  
Review Day One – Key Thoughts and Day Two Agenda 
WORKING LUNCH (Hayes Mansion) 
	 
Making It Work: Communicating Effectively – Discuss Norms & Protocols – “Pain Points”  
Brainstorming “Key Pain Points”  
Develop Effective Protocols for Communication with Stakeholder Groups 
Next Steps, Action Planning and Retreat Evaluation
